bodies.rateFluctuationInfo: The rate of %{assetName} you earn, the Annual Percentage Return (APR), typically fluctuates between 7% - 20%.
bodies.amountStakingInfo: You can stake any amount of %{assetName} and theyâ€™ll immediately beginning earning rewards.
bodies.withdrawInfo: You can withdraw your rewards at anytime, which requires a small gas fee around ~$.01.
bodies.unbondingInfo: When you unstake your tokens, theyâ€™ll remain locked for %{unbondingDays} days, during which time they wonâ€™t earn rewards. After the %{unbondingDays} days, your %{assetName} will return to your Primary Wallet.
bodies.slashingInfo: Staking is done through a validator. Itâ€™s incredibly rare, but if the validator youâ€™ve staked with messes up by allowing false or incorrect transactions to go through, you could lose a part of your assets.
bodies.partnerInfo: Weâ€™ve mitigated this risk by partnering with a reputable validatorâ€”which has a secure, reliable, and audited infrastructure.

learnMore.userProtectionInfo: *Returns are estimated and fluctuate with market conditions.

getStarted.body: Staking is the process of holding funds in a cryptocurrency wallet to support the operations of a blockchain network and, in return, holders are rewarded for their contribution.

saversVaults.description: Earn yield on your %{asset} through the THORChain Savers Vaults. There is no lock up time, and rewards are accumulated automatically. Yield on THORChain comes from swap fees and block rewards. Single-sided yield is capped at half the double-sided yield of liquidity providers.

tooltip.rate: This is the expected rate for this trade pair.

tooltip.protocol: This is the protocol where your trade is being routed.
tooltip.protocolLifi: This is the protocol where your trade is being routed. LI.FI executes a series of intermediary trades under the hood for the best overall combination of price, safety and speed.

errors.title: Something went wrong

label.body: Labeling each of your devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.

recoverySettings.recoveryPassphraseDescription: If you are unsure if your recovery sentence is protected by a passphrase, leave this off.

recoverySentence.body: On your KeepKey screen, you will see your recovery sentence. Write it down. If you lose access to the device, your assets will ONLY be accessible by this sentence.
recoverySentence.infoFirst: Its critical you write it down exactly as it appears on the KeepKey.
recoverySentence.infoSecond: Never share your recovery sentence, it grants access to all of your funds.
recoverySentence.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the steps on your KeepKey to view your Recovery Sentence. Write it down!

factoryState.body: Your KeepKey is set to factory default settings. Create a new wallet, or restore a wallet using your secret recovery phrase

recoverySentenceEntry.body: Using the scrambled keyboard legend on your KeepKey, enter the first 4 letters of each word. If there are less than 4 letters in the word, press Enter, hit the space bar, or click next when you're done typing.
recoverySentenceEntry.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the instructions on your KeepKey to continue.

recoverySettingUp.body: Please wait while we initialize your device and sync your addresses.

recoveryInvalid.body: The Recovery Phrase you have entered is invalid.

disconnect.body: Unfortunately, an error occured while recovering/setting up your KeepKey device. Please disconnect and reconnect your device and try setting up your KeepKey device again. If problem persists, please contact KeepKey support.

info.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
info.description: Write these 12 words down and store them securely offline. This 12 word phrase is used to recover your wallet private keys.
info.warning: Note: if you lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, ShapeShift can't help you recover your wallet and your funds will be lost forever.

descriptions.pin: The PIN is a combination of up to 9 numbers that you select after initializing your KeepKey. A PIN protects your device against unauthorized use in the event your KeepKey falls into the wrong hands.
descriptions.passphrase: Enable the ability to have multiple wallets, accessible by using a unique passphrase for each wallet.
descriptions.label: Labelling each of devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.
descriptions.timeout: Your device goes to sleep after 10 minutes of inactivity by default. However, you can change this.
descriptions.buttonPrompt: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to change the device %{setting}.

selfCustody.title: Your ShapeShift Wallet is Self-Custody
selfCustody.subTitle: You hold the keys and you're the only one who can access it.
selfCustody.body: A self-custody wallet means that you own it, and only you have access to your funds. Your secret recovery phrase is your key to accessing it. Nobody can block you from accessing your funds.

multiChain.title: Multiple chains are supported simultaneously
multiChain.subTitle: You never need to switch chains in the wallet, it works with each chain seamlessly.
multiChain.body: When a new chain is added on ShapeShift, your ShapeShift Wallet will automatically support it.

easyToUse.title: It's easy to use!

foxPage.foxDescription: Since 2019, our shapeshifting FOX Token has been offering users an ever-expanding world of utility and advantages. Today, our ERC-20 governance token not only enables you to influence the future of ShapeShift through your vote, you also have an ever-expanding universe of investing opportunities. Invest, track, and manage your FOX holdings here.
foxPage.mainStakingDescription: Put your FOX to work in single-sided staking contracts to earn FOX rewards. (FOX can still be used in governance while staked, but is otherwise locked into the contract during staking.)
foxPage.tradingUnavailable: %{assetSymbol} is not yet tradeable on ShapeShift. You can trade %{assetSymbol} on ElasticSwap.

otherOpportunitiesDescription.FOX: Explore the many opportunities for providing liquidity, farming for yield, lending and borrowing. Click the â€œGet Startedâ€ links below to visit the external sites of interest to learn moreâ€”and put your FOX to work for you.
otherOpportunitiesDescription.FOXy: Quickly and easily purchase FOXy, the industryâ€™s first DAO rebasing token that offers both yield and profit rewards.

foxPage.governanceDescription: As a FOX holder, you can have a voice in the future of ShapeShift. Below are active or recently passed DAO proposals voted on by token holders.

dappBack.title: âœ¨ Get FOX rewards + more! âœ¨
dappBack.body: Earn FOX rewards by completing tasks on DappBack

bondProtocol.title: Buy FOX at a Discount!

optInModal.title: Help us improve ShapeShift
optInModal.description: ShapeShift would like to gather usage data to better understand how our users interact with the app. This data will be used to continually improve the usability and user experience of our product.

gasLimit.tooltip: The gas limit refers to the maximum amount of gas a user can consume to conduct a transaction.

registry.emptyStateDescription: Try adjusting your search query and try again.

banner.title: Get a Yat
banner.description: Your Yat is your universal emoji username, website URL, payment address, and more.

gasPrice.label: Gas Price
gasPrice.tooltip: The amount you want to pay per unit of gas as a fee to the miner or validator

base.label: Base fee
base.tooltip: The base fee is set by the network and changes every 13-14 seconds depending on demand. Set the maximum price (not including priority fee) in gwei that you're willing to pay for each unit of gas.

priority.label: Priority fee
priority.tooltip: The priority fee is an optional tip to incentivize block producers to prioritize your transaction. Set the priority fee in gwei that you'd like to pay for each unit of gas.

idle.emptyTitle: Earn %{apy}% on your %{asset} with Idle Finance

page-1.title: Senior Best Yield Strategy
page-1.body: Senior Best Yield vaults are set-and-forget strategies that automatically route funds across multiple, conservative-risk yield sources to always provide the highest APY

bullets.one: Automation and optimization of the yield generation across Aave, Compound, and multiple Senior Tranches
bullets.two: Offer maximized returns without the user constantly checking rates and burning gas on every transfer

page-1.title: Junior Best Yield Strategy
page-1.body: Junior Best Yield vaults are set-and-forget strategies that automatically route funds across multiple Junior Tranches to always provide boosted, maximized APYs

bullets.one: Automation and optimization of the yield generation across multiple Junior Tranches, providing boosted yields by design
bullets.two: Offer maximized returns without the user constantly constantly checking rates and burning gas on every transfer

page-1.title: Senior Tranche Strategy
page-1.body: Enjoy DeFi yields with built-in protection on deposits. Senior Tranches offer a full-spectrum coverage, given by their Junior counterparty.

page-1.title: Junior Tranche Strategy
page-1.body: Enjoy boosted DeFi yields. Junior Tranches provide leveraged returns as they are compensated by their Senior counterparty for dragging more risk.

emptyBody.monitorSystem: Utilize Idle finance's monitoring system to find better-performing allocations and trigger a rebalance
emptyBody.offerHighReturn: Offer maximized returns without the user constantly checking rates and burning gas on every transfer
emptyBody.leverageYield: Leverage yield using Senior tranches funds
emptyBody.higherRisk: Higher risk exposure by protecting senior tranches
emptyBody.builtInCoverage: Built-in coverage for variable rate rewards
emptyBody.automation: Automation and optimization of the yield generation across Aave, Compound, and multiple Senior Tranches

bestYield.title: What is Best Yield?
bestYield.body: Automatically maximize yield across multiple battle-tested DeFi protocols. Best-Yield strategy optimizes yield generation by socializing gas costs, automating yield generation by algorithmically shifting capital as new yield opportunities arise.

seniorTranche.title: What is a Senior Tranche?
seniorTranche.body: Enjoy DeFi yields with built-in protection on deposits. Senior Tranches offer a full-spectrum coverage, given by their Junior counterparty.

juniorTranche.title: What is a Junior Tranche?
juniorTranche.body: Enjoy boosted DeFi yields. Junior Tranches provide leveraged returns as they are compensated by their Senior counterparty for dragging more risk.

onRamper.title: Buy Crypto with NO KYC
onRamper.body: Purchase up to $1,000 with Apple Pay

savers.title: Earn rewards on your %{asset}
savers.body: Stake to THORChain savers vault. No lock-up time.

bodyParts.3: ShapeShift incubated a project called Arkeo. Mainnet launch is just around the corner!
bodyParts.4: Arkeo was created to be a decentralized back-end for all node data. Applications that use Arkeo will benefit from increased development velocity, censorship-resistance and
bodyParts.6: while reducing reliance on centralized data sources.

whoQualifies.title: Who qualifies for the Arkeo Airdrop?
whoQualifies.body: There are a number of ways you can qualify for the airdrop using the ShapeShift dApp. The snapshot is rolling, you still have time to qualify!

staking.title: %{asset} Stakers
staking.body: Earn up to %{apy} APR on your idle %{asset} and qualify for the Arkeo airdrop. PLUS if you stake to %{provider}, a 2x multiplier will be applied to your staked balance when your Arkeo airdrop amount is calculated.

lp.title: %{asset1}/%{asset2} Providers
lp.body: Got %{asset1} and %{asset2}? Provide liquidity to the Uniswap V2 Pool to earn %{apy} APR. PLUS the underlying FOX in the FOX/ETH LP tokens you hold will qualify for the Arkeo airdrop.

foxTokenHolders.title: FOX Token Holders
foxTokenHolders.body: Hodling FOX tokens. The larger your bag, the larger your Arkeo airdrop.

foxFarmers.title: FOX/ETH LP Farmers
foxFarmers.body: Earn up to %{apy} APR for staking your ETH/FOX LP tokens in the FOX Farm. PLUS the underlying FOX in the ETH/FOX LP tokens you stake in Round 5 of the FOX Farm will qualify for the Arkeo airdrop.

foxyTokenHolders.title: FOXy Token Holders
foxyTokenHolders.body: Earn up to %{apy} APR on your idle FOX with FOX Yieldy (FOXy). PLUS FOXy held in your wallet will be treated the same as FOX and will qualify for the Arkeo airdrop.

foxEthProviders.title: FOX/ETH Uniswap V2 LPs
foxEthProviders.body: Got %{asset1} and %{asset2}? Provide liquidity to the Uniswap V2 Pool to earn %{apy} APR. PLUS the underlying FOX in the FOX/ETH LP tokens you hold will qualify for the Arkeo airdrop.

atomOsmoProviders.title: ATOM/OSMO LP Providers
atomOsmoProviders.body: Got ATOM and OSMO? Provide liquidity into the pool, to earn %{apy} APR and qualify for the airdrop.

stakeAtom.title: Stake ATOM
stakeAtom.body: Earn up to %{apr} APR on your idle ATOM. PLUS any ATOM you stake earns you Arkeo tokens. If you stake to the ShapeShift DAO Validator you can 2X your airdrop qualification.

stakeOsmo.title: Stake OSMO
stakeOsmo.body: Earn up to %{apr} APR on your idle OSMO. PLUS any OSMO you stake earns you Arkeo tokens. If you stake to the ShapeShift DAO Validator you can 2X your airdrop qualification.

footer.title: There are other ways you can qualify too, outside of the ShapeShift dApp. For a complete list, check out the governance proposal.

disclaimer.body: * Self-custody wallets only will qualify. Tokens held or staked in a wallet via a centralized exchange do not qualify. Need a wallet?

nft.emptyTitle: Where did all the NFTs go?
nft.emptyBody: Don't worry, we've sent out a search party to bring back more amazing NFTs. In the meantime, feel free to stare at this blank space and ponder the meaning of existence.

missions.subtitle: FOX Missions
missions.body: Embark on Missions, Earn Rewards, and expand your knowledge of the Ever-Expanding ShapeShift Ecosystem

getListed.subtitle: Your Project Here
getListed.title: Launch a Mission for Your Project
